name: Steven BURDA, Petitioner v. Alla KORENMAN (f/k/a Alia Burda), Respondent

parties: Steven BURDA, Petitioner v. Alla KORENMAN (f/k/a Alia Burda), Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 8th day of April, 2015, the “Emergency Application for Extraordinary Relief’ and the Application for Relief are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
112 A.3d 1208
Steven BURDA, Petitioner v. Alla KORENMAN (f/k/a Alia Burda), Respondent.
No. 41 MM 2015.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 8, 2015.
